markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rakshasa Ravaged](/Feats.aspx?ID=4015) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vanara" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=368" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 57</row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

</column>

---

You and your family know well the ravages of [rakshasa](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=85) predations, and you know how to best defend yourself against their growing corruption in the world. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120) spells.
name: Rakshasa Ravaged
